original_text: He made also ten lavers, and put five on the right hand, and five on the left, to wash in them: such things as they offered for the burnt offering they washed in them; but the sea was for the priests to wash in.
korean_text: 또 물두멍 열 개를 만들어 다섯 개는 오른쪽에 두고 다섯 개는 왼쪽에 두어 씻게 하되 번제에 속한 물건을 거기서 씻게 하였으며 그 바다는 제사장들이 씻기 위한 것이더라

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 열 개의 대야를 만들었고

sentences.original_text: and put five on the right hand
such things as they offered for the burnt offering
but the sea was for the priests to wash in
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 바다는 제사장들이 씻기 위한 것이었습니다
